Name: Deliverace - Battle Racing
About the game: Pick a car, invite your friends and enter the fray. Remember the classic car combat game style like Twisted Metal, Vigilante 8 and Pickup Express playing Deliverace. A lot of multiplayer modes is available as well, such as: Delivery Express, whoever delivers more cargo/supplies wins. Capture and Hold, in which one package is spawned and the players needs to capture and hold the package, wins who hold until the time is over. Team Supremacy, where each racer is competing against every other player looking for supremacy. Wheels, Ammunition, Decals, Colors and many other features will be available so that you can create your own and unique gameplay style. There are many types of vehicles to choose from, each with its own set of characteristics, to make sure that the gameplay will be unique and adaptable to your playstyle. You will be rewarded with different paintings, icons, sprays, ammunition style, decals, wheels to improve your car in Deliverace. Game Modes: Delivery Express Capture and Hold Team Supremacy Battle Royale (In Development) Conquest (In Development) Awesome features include: Car Customization Arena with 4x4 Unlockable items, vehicles, cards, icons, sprays, and more Matchmaking system Grouping System (Up to 4 players) Game Mode Server-side based Localization: For us, localization is important to make your experience in game better. We're translating the game as soon as possible and each language will be available in future updates. Server Restriction Because of agreements with our online service provider, there are certain regions that are unable to connect to Deliveraceâ€™s online multiplayer services. As a result, server access is restricted in some countries. Apologies to our customers in those regions. Software and online features are subject to terms of use, and privacy policy ( -de-uso , and -de-privacidade ).
